articles.headline: Military drills this month
articles.leadIn: We talked to leading diplomats to deliver to you a comprehensive guide on the current situation.

articles.headline: Lion tracked by poachers, eats poachers
articles.leadIn: You won't believe this story coming out of the San Diego Zoo.

articles.headline: Texas Instruments Announces New Plug-And-Play TI-83 Classic
articles.hook: Get ready for a blast of nostalgia!
articles.leadIn: At $79.99, it's cheaper than the original, finally.

articles.headline: Bolton Calls For Forceful Iranian Response To Continuing U.S. Aggression
articles.hook: National Security Adviser John Bolton called for a forceful Iranian response
articles.leadIn: Iran cannot sit idly by as the American imperialist machine encroaches on their territory, threatens their sovereignty, and endangers their very way of life

articles.headline: Man Ruthlessly Scolds Other Man Online For Having Opinion He Held Less Than 2 Years Ago
articles.leadIn: 25-year-old Brian Gallagher ruthlessly scolded another man online Wednesday for having an opinion identical to one he held less than two years prior.

articles.headline: Agent Asks Failing Actor If He’s Considered Becoming Alt-Right Commentator
articles.hook: Agent Brendon Lourde asked struggling actor Greg Hartley Thursday
articles.leadIn: I think there’s some real demand for a middle-aged performer like you to start up a podcast where you, say, tear into political correctness while chatting with a few guests from the alt-right sphere.
